backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining Dish data, storing recipes in a map, adding recipes, and returning filtered food recommendations with allergy checks and a grey‑zone ingredients list.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that initializes the recipe database with default dishes if empty and preserves existing data otherwise.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing feature evidence for allergies toggle and expanded health‑conditions picker, linking each to affected frontend files and requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files covering components, hooks, styling, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes and global theming variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, root mount point, and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing form state, submitting for recommendations, and toggling between input and results views.
frontend/src/components/DishImage.tsx: Reusable image component loading static dish photos with error fallback UI.
Comprehensive health‑input form with searchable conditions list, allergy management including a no‑allergies toggle, validation, and backend query.
frontend/src/components/ResultsView.tsx: Renders the results page showing user health summary and recommended dishes with badges and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation for fetching food recommendations from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and defines a health‑themed OKLCH color palette and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Converts bigint nutrition values into readable strings with fallback handling.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates health input fields such as age, weight, and blood pressure with range checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, active features, issues, and architectural notes for build planning.
